name: Care for Cassie
text: Give to the Scott Lang player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Scott Lang â†’ remove Care for Cassie from the game. - Choose and discard 1 card from your hand. You cannot change form until your next turn ends. Discard this obligation.

flavor: Yellowjacket has stolen priceless Pym Particle technology.
name: Tech Theft
text: Treat the printed text box of each [[Tech]] player card as if it were blank.

name: Yellowjacket
text:
While you are in [[Giant]] hero form, Yellowjacket gains the [[Giant]] trait and retaliate 1.
While you are in [[Tiny]] hero form, Yellowjacket gains the [[Tiny]] trait and gets +1 ATK.
(Ant-Man's nemesis minion.)

name: Size Increase
text:
Attach to Yellowjacket, if able. If you cannot, attach to the villain.
Uses (3 counters).
attack_text: Forced Response: After attached enemy activates, remove 1 size counter from here.

flavor: "You think you can stop the future?!" - Yellowjacket
name: Yellowjacket's Plan
text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a card from the Ant-Man Nemesis set is discarded this way. Reveal that card.
